info.title: PV array system connection terminal (IEC 61850)

pvconnectionterminal.description: This Resource describes functions for the control and monitoring of IEC 61850 based PV Array system connection terminal.

ratedarrayvoltage.description: Rated voltage of array (Nominal values of maximum power voltage * number of modules) (V)

ratedarraycurrent.description: Rated current of array (Nominal values of maximum power current * number of modules) (A), defined at manufacturing time.

arrayvoltage.description: Output voltage of array in volts (V).

arraycurrent.description: Output current of array in Ampere (A).

insulationresistance.description: Insulation resistance of circuit breaker (M Ohm).

timestamp.description: An RFC3339 formatted time indicating when the data was observed (e.g.: 2016-02-15T09:19Z, 1996-12-19T16:39:57-08:00). Note that 1/100 time resolution should be used.
